ai-patthana21.34:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.34:0.3_0: In the past, future, and present.
ai-patthana21.34:1.1_0: for he does not give rise to the cause, for the sake of the past, future lives, or present.
ai-patthana21.34:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.34:2.1_0: or forwarding off the future, there is no cause or condition for the sake of a future object,
ai-patthana21.34:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.34:3.1_0: for he does not based on the present objects.
ai-patthana21.34:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
